sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select convert(varchar(32),HashBytes(''MD5'', concat(id,LastName,FirstName,Income,Department)),2) as ColHash from dbo.DepartmentB where Id in (',pipeline().parameters.IdDelete,')')
@concat('select convert(varchar(32),HashBytes(''MD5'', concat(id,LastName,FirstName,Income,Department)),2) as ColHash from dbo.DepartmentA where Id in (',pipeline().parameters.IdDelete,')')
@concat('select convert(varchar(32),HashBytes(''MD5'', concat(id,LastName,FirstName,Income,Department)),2) as ColHash from dbo.DepartmentB where Id in (',pipeline().parameters.IdInsert,')')
@concat('select convert(varchar(32),HashBytes(''MD5'', concat(id,LastName,FirstName,Income,Department)),2) as ColHash from dbo.DepartmentA where Id in (',pipeline().parameters.IdInsert,')')
@concat('select convert(varchar(32),HashBytes(''MD5'', concat(id,LastName,FirstName,Income,Department)),2) as ColHash from dbo.DepartmentB where Id in (',pipeline().parameters.IdUpdate,')')
@concat('select convert(varchar(32),HashBytes(''MD5'', concat(id,LastName,FirstName,Income,Department)),2) as ColHash from dbo.DepartmentA where Id in (',pipeline().parameters.IdUpdate,')')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select count(1) as Count from dbo.DepartmentA 
--where PaymentDate = (select max(PaymentDate ) as Count from dbo.DepartmentA)

select count(1) as Count from dbo.DepartmentB 
--where PaymentDate = (select max(PaymentDate ) as Count from dbo.DepartmentB)

select count(1) as Count from dbo.DepartmentA 
where PaymentDate = (select max(PaymentDate ) as Count from dbo.DepartmentA)
select count(1) as Count from dbo.DepartmentB where PaymentDate = (select max(PaymentDate ) as Count from dbo.DepartmentB)
